name: Time Tripper
description:
Time Tripper

Trapped deep in a mysterious complex, is there time to escape or only more danger to be found?

Controls

Designed to be played with a gamepad and controls can be found inside the controls menu from the main menu.
Keyboard were not designed to be used, but they are as follows:
WASD = Gamepad Left Stick (Movement)
Space = A Button (Jump)
Q = Menu Button (Pause)
Left Click = X Button (Slomo Dash)
Right Click = Y Button (Time Reversal)
E = B Button (Interact)

Want a challenge?

Try and beat the Dev Time of 88 seconds remaining!

Want a harder challenge!?

Here is the World Record by TheDavisInator with 91 seconds remaining?!
Time Tripper - WR - YouTube

Credits

Code by Keenan Sice & James Wood
Design by Scott Wealleans & Jack Jarvis
